sentences.en: Acceptance of women preachers varies greatly from denomination to denomination.
sentences.cn: 在接受女性传教士的问题上，不同教派的态度大相径庭。

sentences.en: Denomination Currency of International Oil Transaction: Why US Dollar?
sentences.cn: 国际石油交易的计价货币为什么是美元?

sentences.en: Each church, and each denomination , determines what constitutes competent.
sentences.cn: 每个教会与宗派,需要自行界定怎样才算是“有能力”.

sentences.en: In what kind of denomination do you want your money?
Louisa Mebbin adopted a protective elder - sister attitude towards money in general , irrespective of nationality or denomination.
sentences.cn: 路易莎·梅宾在花钱的事上总是采取一种大姐式的保护态度, 不论是花哪一国的钱,不论花多少.

sentences.en: Mix Counting: Counting are of different denomination at the same time.
sentences.cn: 混点: 同时可以清点不同的面额的纸币.

sentences.en: The - 500 has the highest denomination of the new euro notes.
sentences.cn: 500欧元是欧元新钞中面值最高的纸币.

sentences.en: The Baptists form the largest denomination, followed by the Lutherans.
sentences.cn: 最大的宗派为浸信会, 其次是信义会.

sentences.en: The firm is still operating under another denomination.
sentences.cn: 这家公司改用了名称仍在继续营业.

sentences.en: There are 24 books in the Hebrew Bible, or Tanakh—and depending upon the denomination, between 66 and 84 more books in Christian Bibles, divided between the Old and New Testaments.
sentences.cn: 希伯来《圣经》共有24卷，又名塔纳赫（即《旧约》的源头——译者注）——而且，基督教圣经由于教派的不同，要多出66至84卷，分为《旧约》和《新约》。

sentences.en: They are mainly credit and debit, some cash for small denomination purchases.
sentences.cn: 他们主要是信用卡和付款, 一些是为小面额现金购买.
他们不属任何宗教派别.
目前这个教派已遍布世界各地.

sentences.en: What religious denomination does he belong to?
Which denomination of bill will you be paying with?
sentences.cn: 您要用哪一种秒票付款?

trans.tran_en: a religious group that has different beliefs from other groups within the same religion
